questions.question: What is the BET surface area of MFM-300(Al)?
What is the maximum NO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-300(Al) at 298 K and 1 bar?
What types of interactions are involved in the binding of NO2 within MFM-300(Al)?
questions.answer: Hydrogen bonds, dipole interactions, and supramolecular interactions

questions.question: Is the adsorption of NO2 in MFM-300(Al) reversible?
What is the isosteric heat of adsorption (Qst) for NO2 uptake in MFM-300(Al) at a surface coverage of 2-7 mmol g-1?
Does the presence of water vapor increase the NO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-300(Al)?
What is the IAST selectivity of MFM-300(Al) for NO2 over CO2 at 0.1-1.0 bar?
Can MFM-300(Al) be regenerated post adsorption without loss of crystallinity or porosity?
What is the density of adsorbed NO2 molecules in MFM-300(Al) at 298 K and 1.0 bar?
What is the equilibrium process described as 'first-order' in the study?
questions.answer: The reversible dimerisation of NO2 to N2O4

questions.question: What is the effect of pre-saturating MFM-300(Al) with water on NO2 adsorption?
questions.answer: It reduces the breakthrough time for NO2

questions.question: What is the role of -OH, -CH, and carboxylate groups in MFM-300(Al)?
questions.answer: They are involved in cooperative binding of NO2 and N2O4 molecules

questions.question: Is the NO2/N2 selectivity of MFM-300(Al) greater than 10,000?
What is the pore volume of MFM-300(Al) as obtained from high pressure CO2 adsorption data?
Does MFM-300(Al) show a notable enhancement in NO2 adsorption capacity under wet conditions compared to dry conditions?
What is the theoretical maximum NO2 adsorption capacity of MFM-300(Al) at 294 K using liquid density?
Can MFM-300(Al) be readily regenerated under pressure-swing conditions post adsorption of NO2?
What is the effect of temperature on the hysteresis of NO2 adsorption-desorption in MFM-300(Al)?
questions.answer: The hysteresis increases slightly with increased temperature

questions.question: What is the role of the coexistence of helical monomer-dimer chains of NO2 in MFM-300(Al)?
questions.answer: It could provide a foundation for the fundamental understanding of the chemical properties of guest molecules within porous hosts

questions.question: What is the significance of the charge density difference in the structure of NO2-loaded MFM-300(Al)?
questions.answer: It shows the areas of gaining and losing electron density when forming the complex
